Plot: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.
Title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
Writer: Masamune Shirow (comic "Koukaku-Kidoutai"), Mamoru Oshii (screenplay), Richard Epcar (english version), Mary Claypool (English ADR Writer)
Actors: Akio Ôtsuka, Atsuko Tanaka, Kôichi Yamadera, Tamio Ôki
tomatoConsensus: The animation is lovely, but the plot is complex to the point of inscrutability, leaving Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence both original and numbing.
